line.originaltext: 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed")

line.originaltext: 3 eggs
1/2 teaspoon onion salt
1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided")

line.originaltext: 3/4 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs
line.annotation: create_ing(ing5, "3/4 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs")

line.originaltext: 16 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "16 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves")

line.originaltext: salt and pepper to taste
5 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "5 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted")

line.originaltext: 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 cups milk
2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms
3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided
6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided
line.annotation: separate(ing9, ing17, "4 tbsp butter", ing18, "2 tbsp butter", "")

line.originaltext: Drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach.
line.annotation: do(ing0, , ing19, "drained spinach", "drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach")

line.originaltext: Beat eggs, onion salt and nutmeg.
Add spinach and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing19, ing20}, ing21, "spinach mix", "mix well")

line.originaltext: Combine bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan.
Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture.
Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing23, ing6, ing7}, ing25, "coated chicken", "sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture")

line.originaltext: Place in two greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking pans.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "two greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking pans")

line.originaltext: Place in two greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking pans.
Spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing25}, ing26, "spinach chicken", "spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter.
line.annotation: combine({ing24, ing26, ing8}, ing27, "done chicken", "sprinkle chicken with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing27, t1, ing28, "baked chicken", "bake 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt.
For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt.
Stir to form a smooth paste.
line.annotation: mix(ing30, , ing31, "smooth paste", "stir to form a smooth paste")

line.originaltext: Stir to form a smooth paste.
Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.
Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.
line.annotation: cook(ing32, , ing33, "cooked milk", "cook and stir until thickened and bubbly")

line.originaltext: Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.
Add cheese and stir until melted.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing33}, ing34, "cheese mix", "stir until melted")

line.originaltext: Saute mushrooms in remaining butter.
Saute mushrooms in remaining butter.
Stir into cheese mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing34, ing36}, ing37, "sauce", "stir mushrooms into cheese mixture")

line.originaltext: Carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass.
line.annotation: combine({ing28, ing37}, ing38, "finished chicken", "carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass")
